span.span: The exception that is thrown when a call is made to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要進行呼叫，當終結執行緒時，通用語言執行平台的方法會擲回。When a call is made to the method to destroy a thread, the common language runtime throws a . 是特殊的例外狀況，可以被攔截，但它會自動再次引發結尾`catch`區塊。 is a special exception that can be caught, but it will automatically be raised again at the end of the `catch` block. 當引發這個例外狀況時，執行階段會執行所有`finally`區塊結束的執行緒之前。When this exception is raised, the runtime executes all the `finally` blocks before ending the thread. 因為執行緒可以在中執行的無限制的計算`finally`區塊或呼叫取消中止，沒有不保證會不斷結束執行緒。Because the thread can do an unbounded computation in the `finally` blocks or call to cancel the abort, there is no guarantee that the thread will ever end. 如果您想要等到被中止的執行緒已結束，您可以呼叫方法。If you want to wait until the aborted thread has ended, you can call the method. 是封鎖的呼叫不會傳回執行緒實際停止執行之前。 is a blocking call that does not return until the thread actually stops executing. > [!NOTE] > 當 common language runtime (CLR) 停止背景 threadsafter managed 可執行檔中的所有前景執行緒都結束時，它不會使用。When the common language runtime (CLR) stops background threadsafter all foreground threads in a managed executable have ended, it does not use . 因此，您無法使用偵測時，clr 即將終止背景執行緒。Therefore, you cannot use to detect when background threads are being terminated by the CLR. 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_THREADABORTED，其值 0x80131530。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADABORTED, which has the value 0x80131530. > [!NOTE] > 值繼承屬性一律會是`null`。The value of the inherited property is always `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範中止執行緒。The following example demonstrates aborting a thread. 接收的執行緒`ThreadAbortException`使用方法來取消中止要求，並繼續執行。The thread that receives the `ThreadAbortException` uses the method to cancel the abort request and continue executing. Main ending. ```
